website_summaries.verdict: Contains watch hands, a different style than most sports watches. A nice set of features at a low price.
pros: Customers are pleased with the value they receive from this watch
Neutral black, gray and white design
Excellent performance in all kinds of temperatures
cons: Some customers say digital display areas are too small to read easily, as the watch has no large display screen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch a little under a year ago and I was, and continue to be, surprised about how much I like it. It is very easy to read, and has exactly the amount of functionality that I wanted. It is comfortable and durable, and can go through just about anything you can go through. It’s displays are clear and well organized, with an efficient system to set your alarm, timer, and clock. It id designed and laid out well, and I can say for sure I will be wearing it for years to come. I highly recommend this, as I am sure you will never look back.
customer_reviews.author: mother of boys

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my husband for Fathers Day and he wears it everyday. He loves it! The only issue he has had in the 6 months he has had it is that one of the pins on the band came out. He ordered some more pins on Ebay for a couple of bucks and easily replaced it. It is waterproof, comfy, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Hectic Mom Jamie《Hectic Mommy Material》

customer_reviews.title: This watch is a GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS WATCH! I bought this watch because my Tag Heuer Aquaracer had to be sent in to be repaired after it got condensation inside after snorkeling down to only 15'. It was in the shop for a couple of months so I bought this Etevon to hold me over when I went diving in the Virgin Islands. I dove to 65' without a problem. It has more functions than my TAG and looks pretty damn sharp for a $24 watch. I was reluctant to put my TAG back on. I will be diving with the ETEVON from now on. I can buy 20 ETEVONs for what it cost me to get my TAG repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Some people claim that it is a really big watch but if you're like me and wear dive watches,l it's no bigger than your typical dive watch. Surprised that the quality was as good as it is no issues at all., Other than that I wish the band was interchangeable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: My new go to outdoors watch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch because I needed an inexpensive watch for camping and fishing. A watch that doesn't have to be charged at night and is water proof and can handle the outdoors in rough conditions. This is the watch that fills that need for me. I've had the watch submersed in ice cold trout streams and banging into trees and brush and it hasn't missed a beat. The only downside for me is that it's bigger than needed but that's a minor thing in a watch that performs this well at this price. I would recommend this watch to anyone looking for an affordable do it all watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E East

customer_reviews.title: Durable Low Cost Watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for 5 months now. The crystal is somewhat protected being that the outer ring is about an 1/8" higher than the crystal. I've smacked it numerous times usually on a door frame going from one room to another and expecting to see a large crack or scrape, but the watch seems to weather the abuse well. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice durable low cost watch.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were easy to use, Time has stayed accurate thus far- (3 days). Packaging was good and would present well for a gift. The light function works well to illuminate the face. I haven’t dunked it yet but it’ll happen soon! Update- been swimming with the watch recently and it’s had no condensation, is keeping time well and doing great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Evan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect watch for outdoor work and play. Large face easy for aging eyes to see. Light feature is excellent for checking time and dates in low/no light environment. I was surprised how light the watch is considering its size.(about 1/2 my failed Seiko Diving watch).Time will tell on durability but for price and features its going to be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kern

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking watch for the price. It arrived as promised . I am usually challenged by the various settings on the digital mode but the instructions were simple and very easy to follow. Would recommend this to anyone looking for a very casual watch
customer_reviews.author: GovindaR

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: A bit skeptical due to how much watch and how inexpensive the ad stated, But am I elated to have purchased this watch for for my husband who was looking for a watch for when we are on the water during our many vacations. The watch is pleasing to the eyes and looks a lot more expensive! It is light on the wrist, and the strap looks durable. The background light is a plus. As for the seller they stayed true to the description of the watch. Completely satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Watch
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a nice outdoor sport watch.....look no further! This is a Great watch at a Great price! Better than I had expected, and was easy to operate. I especially like the 24 hour function, with day/date. Quality is very good for the price and I expect it to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are easy and simple to use when setting the time/date/alarm. Really big face but it feels like quality. Just got it today but if it stands up to the waterproof when I'm swimming and showering I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Casual yet sporty.
customer_reviews.text: Wow I am impressed so far by this watch. It was simple and easy to set up from the directions that came and the packaging was sleek. The watch fits great with a nice casual and sporty appeal to it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: this one is by far the best quality, while also being the cheapest
customer_reviews.text: As someone that is a bit of a watch fanatic, I have a collection of watches that I'm quite proud of. Without a doubt, this one is by far the best quality, while also being the cheapest. I've had it for about a month and has flawlessly kept time, while also looking flashy, and being extremely dependable. I've been swimming with this watch on multiple times, I've dove with it, showered, and it looks and appears as if it is fresh out of the box. If you have $25 I would argue that there are not many things worth that $25 more than this watch. Would recommend 11/10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Kingen

customer_reviews.title: Beware - No seller response.....
customer_reviews.text: I realize that this is a VERY inexpensive watch but it did not meet my expectations at all. The watch was purchased for my son to use while being a camp counselor. After a week of use the watch was unusable as the face of the watch was full of condensation. As you can imagine within 1 more day the watch was totally unusable. I tried to contact the company twice and got no response. Be cautious as the seller does not stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stern

customer_reviews.title: Bribe for a Five - but still a nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: Be aware they are offering a free gift for a 5 rating, value $19.99. So I am not falling for that. However, a nice watch for my 11 year old Grandson, he loves it, it has a HUGE face, larger than any watch I've ever seen. The price is a great value so it is a no brainer to purchase. The offer of a $19.99 gift with a five rating so I'm suspecting this is why all the "5's". If you are aware of this bribe - then look for what the comments are, not the rating. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: D Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great simple watch BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Works like it should and holds up well to what I'm doing at work and when I'm working out. Ran a tough mudder with it on and held up real good for with no issue. Washed off very easily and kept on ticking. UPDATE 11/26/18 - The second hand stopped working for no apparent reason. Wasn't running and didn't bang into anything. looked down and I thought one of my kids may have been messing around with it but not the case. I do like this watch but I'd think it should not have a failure like that so soon after purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brian Roemer

customer_reviews.title: The overall watch was good. The watch band however leave something to be ...
customer_reviews.text: The overall watch was good. The watch band however leave something to be desired. But don't dismay it can be corrected. Remove the watch bands. By pressing out the pins they are not in reality screws. Place each side of the Bands in a pot of boiling water, careful with the metal latch side hold it with a pair of tweezers. After 30 seconds in the boiling water remove and wrap around an object centrical that would fit your wrist typical. Hold under cold water to set the shape of the wristbands. Note, use pair of gloves to prevent scalding of fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Watch fetish??
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for my husband for Father's Day. I haven't given it to him yet but I can already tell he's going to love it. He has a watch fetish and because of his work he ruins watches fast. So he needed a nice durable water resistant watch. Based off of the reviews I purchased this one. So far I'm happy with it. If I can edit my review I'll come back on Sunday with an update.
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh c

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch just got it in the mail and instructions were a bit confusing but after a while i started to figure the watch out. it is very nice but a bit bigger than i expected. very good looking and looks even better when you turn on the light when it is dark. also, my old watch had a timer and i was a bit sad to lose it to this one but then i realized this one had a stop watch too and i was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Love The Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have had the for approx. 2 years. Purchased it August 1st 2017. I have been in love with the watch. It's my daily user. It has worked flawlessly up until a couple days ago. All functions work except the hour and minute hand. They no longer keep good time. I went back and looked at the Warranty info, it looks like I am a few days from the Warranty ending. Please reach out to me so I can get it repaired. LOVE THE WATCH!!!! Thanks in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Glover

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product bought it for my teenage son. Three months later he went swimming and now the watch doesn't work. It has water inside and the watch it self completely stopped working. Luckily, Amazon was able to take it back because the return policy is just 30 days but it has a 1yr warranty through the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived already set up very easy to use and a great looking watch. The seller adds a card that said if you give them a 5 star review they will send you a 20.00 free if you snapshot the review and email it to them, then they give an email address where the mail will be undeliverable don't waste your time with the email and it really turned me off with this company. The watch could have earned five stars on his own Merit
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and simple for a digital guy...
customer_reviews.text: I got the timepiece (as I would love to call it) and was impressed by the design. I always wanted a watch that the strap won't tear out easily because of the pins and that's exactly what I got. Good to see that it could serve a dual purpose. Some users talked about difficulty in setting up the watch. I figured it out in less than 10 minutes. Nice and simple product manual. Thinking about gifting several of this watches.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Iheonu

customer_reviews.title: An OK Watch
customer_reviews.text: Large face - a "military" size, easy to see the hands. The digital displays are readable, but small. The analog hands block the digital displays as they move around the face. The backlight only illuminates the digital displays. I wish the hands were luminous and the cardinal hours were on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Worked nicely and than it Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband three years ago. It worked fine and than it stopped working. The blue light went out and than slowly the digital numbers were not showing at all. I though maybe the battery needed to be replaced, and I replaced it twice. Still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy the watch because it looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Watch digital did not worked from the get go. The clock hand don’t work. The the chrome part have oxidation. Did return because I was so frustrated to even return.
customer_reviews.author: Javan Morales

customer_reviews.title: How big are your wrists?
customer_reviews.text: I can say for the money good watch but wow big watch if you have small wrists would not recommend it will look and feel like you have a wall clock strapped to your wrist
customer_reviews.author: Viper79

customer_reviews.title: Good buuut
customer_reviews.text: The timer function is a little hard to work but it works it’s waterproof for suure I go out and fight fires with it on (we get more wet than you’d think) and I even shower with it on. The hands get in the way of the date and other clock on the watch but it’s not a huge problem
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and great
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I bought it it looked really cool so I got very excited. When it got here I was really impressed by the overall look and design and the box it came in. The instructions we're really straight forward and I had it set with in 3 minutes. I am going to buy these as presents for my other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks good, easy to set time date using included instruction card. My son likes how it looks and works. Will update at a later date on how it wears and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: Digital time , date - day -- had to reset 3 times in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews they were good ;however, I have had to reset digital time, date and day several time -- next time it happens going to request refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Baciorowski

customer_reviews.title: It would be a Good Deal BUT straight out of the BOX it NEVER ...
customer_reviews.text: IF this Watch RAN as WELL as it LOOKED ... It would be a Good Deal BUT straight out of the BOX it NEVER kept correct time (Dial Face that is) I mean whats the point of having a Dial Face watch if you are reading the digital display continually to see the correct time I GIVE IT a BIG FAT ZERO ): LAST TIME I ever purchase a time piece from Etevon
customer_reviews.author: peter a rickert

customer_reviews.title: good deal for price
customer_reviews.text: Very large watch easy to see hands . Cons.hands are very wide obscures digital readout sometimes,date, day. Other con is not connected like old style band has a rod anchored in center of watchand band, not spring pinned on outer legs like other watches.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well in water
customer_reviews.text: Good for wearing in a range of weather conditions. The band doesn’t rub and it stays on well. Overall a good sports watch for a variety of conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Tanis Coralee Leonhardi

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: When I received this watch it did not work properly. I did not have time to return it. I will no longer buy this brand of watch due to this experience.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Got damaged in water
customer_reviews.text: When watch got wet while we were enjoying the water rides , it got damaged due to being wet and so had to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Samir Ray

customer_reviews.title: Returned Defective
customer_reviews.text: The watch is attractive, looks well made, and comfortabele to wear; unfortunately, it did not do what it needed to primarily do -keep time. Digital would not keep time with analogue by hours a day, date would suddenly change month and day. Thanks amazon for accepting the return. Sad to do it; really liked the looks of the watch. Maybe this one was a rare defect?
customer_reviews.author: t morris

customer_reviews.title: I bought this because I was going to basic training ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was going to basic training for the army and it almost made it. The lettering faded and the dial broke off. Made it 2/3 of the way till I had to toss it. But it told time and I was the only one with a semi non digital watch so I could count someone’s pulse which came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mastercard

customer_reviews.title: Good watch for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is quite nice. It is a little bigger than I expected but that is not a deterrent for an everyday wear watch. There are only a couple of things that I am not excited about: first, the instructions are not very clear. There could be one or two more diagrams. Second, my watch came with some dust on the inside of the glass. I do not want to take the glass off, although it looks like I could, because I don't want to break it. Other than that, this is a nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L Christian

customer_reviews.title: sticks out a little extra like it's already pulled out
customer_reviews.text: The stem that is used to set the time, sticks out a little extra like it's already pulled out, and it's warped/bent. No telling how long it's going to last?
customer_reviews.author: DCB

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Casio G Shock, however the watch failed and I needed another ASAP. I saw the watches advertised in Amazon. They appeared to be too nice for the price. I had to see. I found it is a beautiful watch with many features. I would buy again. Great watch at the fraction of the COST!
customer_reviews.author: D. Quenzer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for my job!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I get complements on it all the time at work. I needed to have a digital watch at work but I prefer one with hands. Has everything I need on it. You have to set the digital time exactly with the hands or one gets ahead and it's super annoying! Little big for me being a smaller female but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rinke

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here
customer_reviews.text: Bought my husband this watch recently, and he loves it. The alarm beep is quiet enough to not be bothersome while still doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Bushcraft watch, waterproof, good lighting, solid investment.
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a waterproof, outdoorsy, bushcraft watch. This is it. I tried a Timex but it was very uncomfortable. I like the functions and would recommend this watch to any outdoor enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Drew

customer_reviews.title: Total crap. The button to set the watch doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Total crap.The button to set the watch doesn't work. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would by from etevon again.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I have received a TON of compliments for this watch. It is truly stylish. It functions better than I thought it would and it was very easy to set up. The product arrived to my front door ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: keenonali

customer_reviews.title: The real test will be if I'm still happy in a year or two
customer_reviews.text: Its an inexpensive sports watch. I've had it for a few months, I wear it biking, paddling, hiking, etc. It works, it looks okay. It has gotten wet and continued to work, so no complaints up to now. The real test will be if I'm still happy in a year or two. For $25, I can't complain too much if it works well for 2 or 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: gary blose

customer_reviews.title: looks great but small disks are so small very difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, looks great but small disks are so small very difficult to read. Setup instructions confusing.
customer_reviews.author: DaSarge

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch, I use it while teaching class.Very comfortable watch.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Roman IV

customer_reviews.title: after less than year the analog watch is losing time
customer_reviews.text: after less than year the analog watch is losing time and i have to set the time a few times a day and the seller don't reply and no warranty on the product. don't buy this item from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: c a

customer_reviews.title: The band is comfortable over a whole day and the directions for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch is slightly larger than I was hoping for, however I have already banged it around a little and it shows zero signs of even the slightest damage. The band is comfortable over a whole day and the directions for the digital time and day displays were clear and concise. Coupled with the price, this is a terrific value purchase and would recommend for most casual or working situations for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch for the money. I hope it lasts. So far it's given me no reason to think it won't. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in STL

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I too was a bit of a skeptic ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I too was a bit of a skeptic when ordering this watch, however I was very pleasently surprised with the quality and design. I'd call it a high-profile watch, chunky and durable looking - just what I wanted..!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Seems very sturdy and something he'd love as an outdoorsy man/boysout working ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a christmas gift for my little brother... Seems very sturdy and something he'd love as an outdoorsy man/boysout working towards his eagle scout! Came packaged nicely and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: This broke a week after my son started wearing it-- the pin snapped and it was lost. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Keeps great time, looks good and was cheap
customer_reviews.text: Keeps great time, looks good and was cheap. Good some favorable comments from friends
customer_reviews.author: Sanford Friedlander

customer_reviews.title: Initially liked it. Have been using it for some weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially liked it. Have been using it for some weeks now. Unfortunately the second hand has become loose and doesn’t go around anymore. Should expect better. Even from an inexpensive watch.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap sports watch
customer_reviews.text: Great plastic watch for exercise. Has a great stop watch, back light, and working alarm. Never got the stated step counter in the manual to work though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water and outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch. Does a little more than I was looking for, but this is perfect for at the beach, swimming and wade fishing. Far better than using my i-phone for these types of situations.Now I will know what time it is when I'm outside involved in great activities. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Oza Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Lol better than almost any other rating
customer_reviews.text: Has help up to my 11 year old son and this should be a rating. Lol better than almost any other rating.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was happy with the product but after one year of used the band just broke on me! And the worse thing you cant even buy the band's online cuz is no where to be found, now I got stock with a useless watch! 😪
customer_reviews.author: rmaestre

customer_reviews.title: Great Tough watch, Just be gentle with buttons
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Lasted a while, but when my first one broke it was a button getting stuck, and unusable. The watch itself was completely fine, and will still tell time. My second one seems to be holding up better though.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Neff

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Watch
customer_reviews.text: Looks stylish and works very well. Easy to set up. Gifted to my husband and he loved it a lot. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mamta

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome features. Easy to follow setup instructions. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! Son loved it! It has so many features and is the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Kera L. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Watch feels nice, sturdy strap
customer_reviews.text: Watch feels nice, sturdy strap. Not too bulky. Love all the functions, easy to see and adjust. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came used
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch it looks good and well made but the one a purchase came used had chips and scuffs .
customer_reviews.author: Greg brown

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I like all the functions available. Product was as described.
customer_reviews.author: EagleEye

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I'm used to
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is large it's comfortable, seems reliable and we'll made. It's got the basics of a digital watch and works well.
customer_reviews.author: peter b nowikow

customer_reviews.title: It Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The watch knob broke 2 weeks after I got it. I can not change the time because of the knob missing. In addition, the arm is sitting over the digital time therefore I can even tell the time now. The watch was bulky as well. I will never recommend this watch to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to my Dad for Christmas and he absolutely LOVED it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my Dad for Christmas and he absolutely LOVED it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suny Smile

customer_reviews.title: Good watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good watch for the price. I surf with it all the time and no complaints. The only problem I have is it's difficult to read the time at night. So I just use my phone instead
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Asuncion

customer_reviews.title: Watch with no worry
customer_reviews.text: It is easy use and function well. My dad go swimming with it and he said it work great in the water and not worry. It is a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Minh

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Held up to a 13 year old boy. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: laryssa clark

customer_reviews.title: Great watch - attractive and loads of features
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks great, is easy to set, and feels comfortable. It's slightly bigger than i expected, but very attractive. Loads of great features - very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Greg O

customer_reviews.title: NOT water resistant as advertized.
customer_reviews.text: Only wore the watch for 2 weeks, and noticed it is all fogged up inside. That means its not water resistant. I contacted the seller since the return date passed. I am awaiting a response.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sport watch
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent watch and perfect gift for my brother. Got in a very good deal. It has so many functions like alarm, calendar, back-light for dark, and it is waterproof. Excellent sport look and perfect black color. I am happy to purchase this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Neeta Bharti

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. Needed a new one and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: JBozz300

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The dial is quite large and doesn't fit my husband wrist very well.
customer_reviews.author: Softball17Mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but was a gift and my son sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Joemanchu

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I need. The instructions are not clear, and obviously written by someone whose English is acquired.
customer_reviews.author: Elgis

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but it came broken had to get a refund
customer_reviews.author: Channing Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch right out of the box because it is professional looking. Very easy to set the time, excellent quality and packaging for a cheap price. Beats the junk available at Walmart hands down.
customer_reviews.author: KnightRider

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch.The watch was quite easy to set up and I did it without even looking at the directions. It's sporty and durable but at the same time, it looks pretty nice. For only 60 dollars(got it for 22 dollars while it was on sale) this is a very cool watch, easily gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Sport Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great watch by design and use. I had Armitron before but I like this more than Armitron. Nice Rubber Strap that fits in my hand so perfect. Will buy it again for my brother
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Big and bold

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: It’s a ok watch the time would change on its own sometimes.The watch body broke from the band just from my regular day use. But I guess you get what you pay for. Cheap watch.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and accurate time piece! Waterproof tested during snorkeling trip!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy ! Value plus excellent time piece, easy visibility ,and worked flawlessly on recent snorkeling trip ! Band is very comfortable! FIVE STARS !!!!!

product_meta.title: ETEVON Men’s ‘Captain’ Stylish Outdoor Sport Watch with Thicken Silicone Strap - 30m Waterproof - EL Luminous - Multifunction - Dual Time Display - Quartz Analog Digital Wrist Watches for Men - Black

feature_bullets: FASHION CAPTAIN DESIGN: 45mm stereoscopic dial with scratch-resistant acrylic crystal glass window; Quartz analog and digital display with LED back light; 3mm thicken silicone band with stainless steel buckle.
PRECISE TIME KEEPING: Imported Japanese movement ensures precise time keeping within ±1s deviation per day with long lasting Japanese MAXCELL lithium battery of 2 years life.
MULIT-FUNCTION OF WATCH: Including 12/24-hour format, dual time zone, EL backlight, calendar (date, week and month), hourly chime, alarm with snooze, 1/100 stopwatch with split time.

REAL 30M (98FT) WATERPROOF: Hand washing, taking shower, raining and swimming are all no problem! In addition, the watch, with excellent shockproof and anti-frost performance, is suitable for all kinds of sports and outdoor activities

ETEVON AFTER-SALE SERVICE: Comes in a sport style gift box. No extra wrapping needed. 90 days money back guarantee for any reasons & 12 months replacement or full refund for quality issues & 24 months maintenance for quality issues
